description:
Roll smoothly and quietly, with a bit of low-key elegance. The burly construction is water-resistant and tough enough to withstand being tossed into boats or flung around on baggage carousels. Expansion straps gives you additional capacity for souvenirs or those times you want to bring just one more sweater.

  • Fabric is rugged 840-denier nylon, coated with polyurethane for waterproofness and abrasion resistance
  • Lined in 200-denier recycled polyester with a PU coating
  • All zip closures are YKK reversed coil, durable and water-resistant (but not waterproof)
  • Compression straps to cinch the load
  • Strong 50mm webbing top and side handles
  • Telescopic handle extends up to 58cm
  • Multiple internal and external zippered mesh pockets
name: MEC Outpost Roller 100L
